tool_description: API for hiding faces and car license plates in images.
name: Image Anonymization
title: Image Anonymization

api_list.name: Get list of available modes
api_list.description:
Service provides server modes that may be used to choose which kind of objects to hide. This endpoint returns list of modes that may be used as query parameters for requests to the `results` endpoint.

The following modes are supported:

* `hide-clp` – to hide car license plates
* `hide-face` – to hide faces
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://image-anonymization.p.rapidapi.com/v1/modes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-anonymization.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get version
api_list.description: Returns an actual version of the service in format `vX.Y.Z` where X is the version of API.
